verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> and Psalm <S%H4210><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah. <S%H7141><s%> Great <S%H1419><s%> is the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised <S%H1984><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of our God, <S%H430><s%> in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of his holiness. <S%H6944><s%>

Beautiful <S%H3303><s%> for situation, <S%H5131><s%> the joy <S%H4885><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth, <S%H776><s%> is mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> on the sides <S%H3411><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%> the city <S%H7151><s%> of the great <S%H7227><s%> King. <S%H4428><s%>
God <S%H430><s%> is known <S%H3045><s%> in her palaces <S%H759><s%> for a refuge. <S%H4869><s%>
For, <S%H3588><s%> lo, <S%H2009><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> were assembled, <S%H3259><s%> they passed by <S%H5674><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>
They <S%H1992><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, and so <S%H3651><s%> they marveled; <S%H8539><s%> they were troubled, <S%H926><s%> and hasted away. <S%H2648><s%>
Fear <S%H7461><s%> took hold upon <S%H270><s%> them there, <S%H8033><s%> and pain, <S%H2427><s%> as of a woman in travail. <S%H3205><s%>
Thou breakest <S%H7665><s%> the ships <S%H591><s%> of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> with an east <S%H6921><s%> wind. <S%H7307><s%>

As <S%H834><s%> we have heard, <S%H8085><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> have we seen <S%H7200><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> of our God: <S%H430><s%> God <S%H430><s%> will establish <S%H3559><s%> it forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
We have thought <S%H1819><s%> of thy lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thy temple. <S%H1964><s%>

According to thy name, <S%H8034><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> is thy praise <S%H8416><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the ends <S%H7099><s%> of the earth: <S%H776><s%> thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of righteousness. <S%H6664><s%>
Let mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> let the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> be glad, <S%H1523><s%> because of <S%H4616><s%> thy judgments. <S%H4941><s%>
Walk about <S%H5437><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> and go round about <S%H5362><s%> her: tell <S%H5608><s%> the towers <S%H4026><s%> thereof.

Mark ye well <S%H7896><s%> <S%H3820><s%> her bulwarks, <S%H2430><s%> consider <S%H6448><s%> her palaces; <S%H759><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> ye may tell <S%H5608><s%> it to the generation <S%H1755><s%> following. <S%H314><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is our God <S%H430><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever: <S%H5703><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> will be our guide <S%H5090><s%> even unto <S%H5921><s%> death. <S%H4191><s%>
